statements: DELETE FROM installation_instructions WHERE fixture_id = 101 AND instruction_id = 5;
DELETE FROM lighting_fixtures WHERE power_consumption > 50 AND color_temperature < 4000;
DELETE FROM lighting_fixture WHERE fixture_id = 101 AND wattage >= 50;
DELETE FROM installation_instruction WHERE steps LIKE '%assemble%' AND fixture_id IN (SELECT fixture_id FROM lighting_fixture WHERE color_temperature < 4000);
DELETE FROM projects WHERE project_name = 'Kitchen Renovation';
DELETE FROM installation_instructions WHERE instructions LIKE '%mount%'
